QuestData.Title: Basic Orders
QuestData.Description: Hey! You look like you could give us a hand!$B$BIf you're willing to help our cause, we have to get you through training. Gnome training is brutal and rigorous, so I hope you're ready.$B$BHead over to Drill Sergeant Steamcrank and he'll walk you through what you need to know. Make sure you follow his orders when he gives them, or else you'll never make it$B$BI'm warning you though, it's tough over there. Come back to see me, if you make it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Drill Sergeant Steamcrank's cues and then report back to Captain Tread Sparknozzle.
